channel.title: Run.bat error
channel.description: when i ran richscape v3 client i got this error [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: sign/signlink at client.main(client.java:2448) at EGUI.main(EGUI.java:11) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: sign.signlink at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) ... 2 more Press any key to continue . [/code]
